ygData.subject: Hunt for the Wolf
ygData.msgSnippet: Hearing Kup coming at Razael s quarters, Katya turned back. Katya: Kup! Thank Kerensky I found you! You have to help me, and I need all the warriors I can

Hearing Kup coming at Razael's quarters, Katya turned back.

Katya: Kup! Thank Kerensky I found you! You have to help me, and I
need all the warriors I can gather.

Blackfang: No! Don't! It's a crazy run! We'll all be dead if we do it!

Katya: Blackfang, if do not stop immediately, I will have to challenge
you to a trial of grievance.

Blackfang stopped, but he was visibly not happy with that.

The lady turned back to Kup.

Katya: So? What do you say?
